IGI Releases

Welcome to IGI Release pages!

You'll find here usefull information regarding INFN developed grid middleware software releases, roadmanps, documentation and support.

IGI Release content

The IGI Release represents the collection of the grid middleware software developed by INFN:

  • CREAM products
    • BLAH - Batch Local Ascii Helper
    • CREAM CE - Computing Resource Execution And Management
    • CREAM modules for LSF, TORQUE, SLURM -
    • CREAM client
    • Cluster
  • DGAS
  • StoRM
  • VOMS
  • WMS
